response.hook: Dive into the Fibonacci sequence generation with this simple yet effective Python program.

key_lines.text: A simple program that generate the Fibonacci sequence of N numbers.
N = int(input("Enter how many numbers the Fibonacci sequence will have: "))

response.next_thread: Follow the nearest referenced symbol to continue the thread.
summary: The program prompts the user for the number of Fibonacci numbers to generate.
It handles invalid inputs gracefully, ensuring a robust user experience.
Once valid input is received, it calculates and displays the Fibonacci sequence.
